sense.def:
Izraz
now
pomeni ta hip ali čas, pogosto v nasprotju s preteklostjo ali prihodnostjo.

seg.quote: It is now just after one o'clock.
Now is the time to find out.
From now on, you are free to do what you like.

sense.def:
Izraz
now
ali
now that
uporabljamo, ko govorimo o učinku nekega dogodka ali spremembe.

seg.quote: I like him a lot now he's older.
Now that she's found him, she'll never let him go.

sense.def:
V zgodbah z izrazom
now
poudarimo razliko med stanjem, o katerem pripovedujemo, in prejšnjim stanjem.

seg.quote: They were walking more slowly now.

sense.def:
Pri pripovedovanju uporabimo izraz
now
tudi takrat, ko neki trditvi želimo dodati poudarek.

seg.quote: I ran downstairs. Now this was something the intruder had not expected.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da se bo nekaj zgodilo
any day now
ali
any time now
, pomeni, da se bo zgodilo zelo kmalu.

seg.quote: Any day now, the local authority is going to close it down.

sense.def:
Če se nekaj zgodi
now and then
,
every now and then
ali
now and again
, se dogaja občasno, vendar ne pogosto ali redno.

seg.quote: Every now and then there is a confrontation.
I used to let him play with us now and again.
